LF Fight Sticks, leverless controllers, Hitbox

In the spirit of the recent fighting games coming out this year I've been on the look out to make a decent purchase from from current offerings of fighting sticks, hitboxes and leverless controllers. However, it doesn't seem like we have a lot of choice in Canada besides Amazon, Canadian Joysticks or ordering directly from the manufacturers (HORI, Qanba).

1 reply
